definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Clearly, helium has the least polarizable electron cloud.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，氦的可極化電子雲最小。

sentences.english: Its response is dominantly assigned to the ultrafast distortion of the electron cloud.
sentences.chinese: 其超快響應主要歸因於玻璃中電子雲的超快畸變。

sentences.english: This is the clouds or the orbitals, electron cloud interactions.
sentences.chinese: 這就是電子雲或軌道電子雲相互影響。

sentences.english: This is the clouds or the orbitals, electron cloud interactions.
sentences.chinese: 這就是電子雲或軌道電子雲相互影響。
